title: 为什么：Who is your favorite YouTube channel？
contents:
When can I escape from evil China?Chinese identity is a burden for me,China is an evil country.

Freedom is not free，Taiwan ,Hong Hong,Xinjiang,Tibet and Shanghai were independent，for freedom,must kill the Chinese Communist Party.

Flight for freedom,stand with Hong Kong.

My favorite YouTube channel is Xu Siyuan

I really wish I could escape from China as soon as possible

I hope that netizens of pincong can also escape from China as soon as possible
